node.name: PHP filtering
node.rich_text: Kya problem hoti hai normal LFI me?
file include karta hai to: â€¢ PHP uss file ko
, sirf output milta hai (ya blank agar kuch render na ho)
source code dekhna bahut important hota hai: â—‡ Passwords, database details, hidden features, file names â€” sab mil sakta hai source code me

aa vastu ma mai ee vastu samji ke apde ek php no command run karaviye chhe je url thi php file apde server ma banaviye chhe ane ee file mai apde apdo payod add kari ne php file ne url thi server na command run karavi sakiye ha barober mai aa vastu chhe
ana pachi apde fuzzing karsu ke server ma apde php file ne fuzz karsu jethi php na command apde run kari sakiye sayad tak aaa vastu samjvani

mane aa badhu samj na padva ne lidh emai internet par search karyu ke aa vastu keva su mange chhe to pachi mai youtube ma the cyberexpert no video joyo ane mane ghani badhi vastu oo mali
jema ek vastu chhe
aa vastu maare pela sikhvani hati pan htb ma aa module pachi hati
atlabadha php wraper hoi je apdde use kari ne lfi ne exe kari sakiye â€¢
â€” Accessing various I/O streams â€¢
â€” Find pathnames matching pattern â€¢

â€” Process Interaction Streams
ana vise vadhu janva maate uper ni website check karvi ane ha ama ek vastu janva jevi chhe ee chhe

ama ek configuration aave ee ma be vastu hoi
ek to hoi
aa vastu ma php wraper ni setting by default on hoi chhe ane ama apde lagbhag badhaj php wraper no use kari sakiye chiye jo koi case maa aaa vastu

jeva wraper j band thai bija koi band thatu nathi
chhe jo aa case ubho thay to check karvu ke
jeva wraper kaam kare chhe ke nahi ane aaa vastu ne jo disable karvi hoi to

hovu jove jo aa na hoi to apde possible chhe lfi ne exe kari sakiye
ane uper je filter chhe aa php nu ek keyword chhe ane ene use

ne controll karva thai chhe
ane haji ek vastu je mai the cyber exepert thi sikhi ee aa chhe ke LFI ane Directory Path travalsn bane alag vastu chhe
LFI ma Code ni andar

no use kari ne apde koi pan file ne read athva write kari ne exe kari sakiye ane biji paraf
Diractory Travelson ma

no use karine apde apde koi pan diactory ne open kari sakiye
aa vastu no main differnce chhe

ma
Ane Lfi mai INlcude no khub j moto role chhe apde ee target maani ne chaleiye chhe jema apde
sathe game ramiye chhe je pan code lakhavano chhe ee badho include ni andarj exe thase apde koi pan
lakhiye te sidhu j exe thase ane tenu output apdne web na behaviour thi j khabaar padse apde kaato ina output ne php sivay na
code ma translate kari ne apde tene base64 kato bija koi ma convert
kari ne apde webpage par show karavu padse ane aaa aa vastu apde file upload vul thi pan kari sakiye apde khali ek koi pan file na

ni andar apde php no code add kari ne upload kari devani rehse aa php no code apde game tya add kari asskiye chiye ane haa aa vastu ne apde rce sudhi lay jay sakiye karn ke jova jaiye t apde ek command ne server par run karavi ne exe kariye chhe jo aa vastu mali jay to
possible chhe aaj na addha divas ma mai atlu sikhi lidhu have hu lagbhag ane badhi lab karva jaav chuu
node.codebox:
PHP Filter wrapper ka use Tu LFI payload me php://filter use karke PHP code ko execute karne ke bajay base64 encode karwa sakta hai, fir use decode karke pure source code dekh sakta hai.
ğŸ“Œ Format:
php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=<filename> ğŸ“ Example: http://site.com/index.php?language=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=config Agar application automatically .php append karta hai, to config ka matlab config.php hi banega âœ… ğŸ› Output decode kaise karein? Jab tu upar wala URL access karega, to ek long base64 encoded string milegi.
Usko decode karne ke liye terminal me:
echo 'PD9waHAK...base64 string...KICB9Ciov' | base64 -d Yeh command tujhe actual source code dikhayegi.

ğŸ” Fuzzing se aur PHP files dhoondh Jaise:
ffuf -w /path/to/wordlist.txt -u http://site.com/FUZZ.php
Aur fir har milne wali file pe yeh payload try kar:
?language=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=FILENAME ğŸ§ª Test karne ke liye:
curl "http://site.com/index.php?language=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=index" Yeh tujhe base64 output dega jo tu decode kar sakta hai:
echo "<base64_output>" | base64 -d
